```{r setup}
library(BayesRates)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
nevent_df <- BayesRates::nz_divorces %>%
  rename(nevent = divorces)
```


```{r}
py_df <- BayesRates::nz_population %>%
  rename(py = population) %>%
  mutate(time = as.integer(time))
```

```{r}
ans <- smooth.agetime(nevent_df = nevent_df,
                      py_df = py_df,
                      model_age = RW2(),
                      model_time = AR1(),
                      byvar = "sex")
```
